abstract: Like deep-dish pizza, the Cubs and a mayor named Daley, LaSalle Bank has long been a Chicago institution. But until a few weeks ago, few would have called it a global banking prize. Now, LaSalle is at the center of what could be the biggest bank deal ever, as a trophy for at least two banking titans: Bank of America and the Royal Bank of Scotland.
lead_paragraph: Like deep-dish pizza, the Cubs and a mayor named Daley, LaSalle Bank has long been a Chicago institution. But until a few weeks ago, few would have called it a global banking prize. Now, LaSalle is at the center of what could be the biggest bank deal ever, as a trophy for at least two banking titans: Bank of America and the Royal Bank of Scotland.

headline.main: Banking Giants Bring the Fight to Chicago
